question: Which are the two countries of origin of the wine variant "Tokaji"?
explanation: Hungary and Slovakia are the two countries of origin of the wine variant "Tokaji". Tokaji or Tokay is the name of the wines from the Tokaj wine region in Hungary or the adjoining Tokaj wine region in Slovakia. This region is noted for its sweet wines made from grapes affected by noble rot, a style of wine which has a long history in this region. The "nectar" coming from the grapes of Tokaj is also mentioned in the national anthem of Hungary.
